messages.messageContent:
Big chaos in the kibbutz.
Security issues.

Everyone locked in houses.
No wandering allowed.
All over the country....

Special problem in Kfar Aza.
Very.

They infiltrated with paragliders
Currently on TV we can see them on an open pickup truck shooting in the streets
This is a message from Sderot.

They're going to upload pictures from the fighting in Jewish settlements on WhatsApp
CENSORED
. Don't open it, it will hack your phone within 10 seconds and cannot be stopped in any way.
Pass this information to family and friends
They talked about it on TV. Cyber attacks against us are also starting from various directions.

Hello everyone. I spoke with CENSORED and there's room for everyone in Shefayim and I arranged transportation.
Whoever is interested let me know so I can tell CENSORED
CENSORED
CENSORED
CENSORED
CENSORED

Our dear friends.
This is the hardest day in our family's life
We lost our most precious ones.
Our beloved CENSORED were found dead in their home.
The sons CENSORED are missing.
The destroyed and shattered kibbutz, physically and mentally, will never be the same as it was.
We're all 'on the edge'
The quality group we travel with is one big united family. Love and support without limits.
Our resilience and togetherness will help us get through these hours, days, weeks, and months in the best way possible.
Huge thanks to CENSORED and Briza company without you we couldn't finish this surreal journey where 33 people were saved from hell and got their lives back
Love you
CENSORED
CENSORED you moved us. Tears are flowing from everyone. We will hug you as much as we can. I believe I speak for everyone.

Thank you.
For us this is a holocaust.
No words, no consolation... We will continue to stand by your side wherever you are - with you with all our hearts!!!
The heart hurts so much.

CENSORED our hearts are broken with you.
We'll do everything to continue being a united community and we'll hug and support you and all community members.
CENSORED no words just pain. Thinking of you

CENSORED
Good and beloved people,
We are with you and for you.
The heart aches, the soul cries,
The mind can't comprehend.
Crazy....
We'll help and hug in any way possible.
We love you.
Be strong.🙏
The heart aches be strong CENSORED
Love you..with all my heart...

CENSORED
Beloved and dear ones
Always with you and for you.
Be strong.
Dear CENSORED
Dear CENSORED
Be strong
We are with you and for you.🙏

CENSORED we share your pain and the break that has struck you.
We also feel the pain of CENSORED and the pain of CENSORED and our hearts are broken with you.
Dear CENSORED, I share in your grief and sorrow. Strengthening you on such a difficult day. Hope and believe that you will have the strength and mental resources to cope with the unimaginable loss.

CENSORED. The last days were days of sadness and anger and helplessness in face of hatred.
We hug and love you and hope and pray that the sons will return. 🙏

Good evening CENSORED dear friends... CENSORED... We came here 23 years ago and we are grateful for every moment we are in your company. Here we grew up with CENSORED here these wonderful children grew up. And with the CENSORED family that's ours and in the blink of an eye we were brutally cut off and lost our loved ones... CENSORED and CENSORED who are defined as missing... Thank you wonderful group... Thank you for the support acceptance and love. Thank you CENSORED who does everything with gentleness understanding and pleasantness and to CENSORED wonderful trip you are all wonderful people thank you for being with us in this difficulty hugs to everyone... CENSORED

My arsenal of words is dry in face of all this horror, in face of the loss of young lives, only the great love for all of you remains and the belief that only our life force, the resilience of togetherness and doing good can overcome evil. Hugging you all.

CENSORED family
CENSORED family
My heart is with you and the eyes won't stop tearing. Simply hell on earth be strong. I'm here for you whenever you ask. May you be comforted from heaven.

Thank you very much CENSORED.
It's very hard for us.
Can't describe it.

CENSORED family
We just went through 24 hours of waiting for hope with you and unfortunately you were informed of the worst disaster. CENSORED and I hug and strengthen your hearts and cry with you, your disaster is heavy and multiplied sevenfold, you lost two amazing children and beloved and successful grandchildren and an exemplary family, and life is not as it was yesterday, and yet you are strong families and you have children and grandchildren who won't leave you and we are with you all the time, for any help you ask. Be strong, we love you.
CENSORED

CENSORED family and CENSORED family
I simply don't know what to say. I believe these moments are for sending sincere condolences. Accept our condolences.
CENSORED.

Information we just received CENSORED
There's identification of CENSORED and one of the girls. Probably CENSORED but not sure.
Can't find CENSORED and 3 children.
Defined by the army as missing.
Maybe we have a slight glimmer of hope here.
It's hard for us.
Keeping fingers crossed
Keeping "fingers" crossed for you!!!

Of course taking the information with utmost caution.
Everything is open.
Be strong and courageous!!!
If only our prayers would be answered and they'll be found healthy
From me too.

For us until there's iron-clad information everything is questionable.
If only.
Hoping for the best

It's even hard for me to say with God's help CENSORED
Let's hope.
Sending you all strength to cope, even with the uncertainty.

Update CENSORED,
CENSORED wasn't murdered apparently ran when the terrorists entered the house CENSORED found her crying on the path and brought her to their house.
CENSORED and the children were taken captive and apparently CENSORED is with them.
Let's pray🙏🙏🙏

Keeping fingers crossed and hoping for good news. Be strong CENSORED
CENSORED
